content: Hi everyone, as promised, here is the (updated & clarified) list of design questions for us to settle. Please make comments within the document. We'll settle what we can that way and confirm and try to get through the rest on our call on Friday. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DhKvzTozXYGB_ktO_VcRr1b1QqFhq_XHB4UMS7bOv6g/edit?usp=sharing
